text: Samatulya naya muminadera madhyekara yara base thaka loka -- kono cotajakhama na thakate'o, ara yara allah‌ra pathe tadera dhanasampatti o tadera janaprana diye jihadakari. Nija nija dhanasampatti o apana janaprana diye jihadakaridera allah maha‌tmya diyechena base-thaka-lokadera upare padamaryadaya. Ara allah saba'ike kalyanadanera oyada karechena. Ara mujahidadera allah maha‌tmya diyechena base-thaka-lokadera ca'ite birata puraskara dane
